metadata.synopsis: Killed in a plane crash, a New York publisher (Noel Coward) returns to find anyone who mourns his passing.

reviews: Hecht, MacArthur, and Noel Coward proving themselves cleverer than any other three people in the world, to their own satisfaction.
There is very little action, but what there is, especially in the latter sequences, is likely to raise your hair rather queerly on your scalp.
In this film smoking saves lives.
